title: Onboard your devices in Blynk
description: Connect via Blynk.Edgent, Blynk.NCP, MQTT, HTTPs API, LoRaWAN, the Blynk Library, or import from third-party cloud services.

title: Device Templates
description: With a template, you define key parameters, data streams, and UI elements once—then apply them across multiple devices instantly.

title: Webhooks
description: Trigger external actions when specific device or template events occur—perfect for notifications, logging, or custom workflows.

title: Integrations
description: Connect Blynk to external platforms like AWS, The Things Stack, and others to onboard devices and enable two-way data exchange.

title: Datastreams
description: Datastreams are the backbone of device communication in Blynk, acting as channels that transmit data between your hardware and the platform.

title: Automations
description: Use schedules, device states, or events to trigger automated actions across your devices.
